translations: n.硬式棒球（等于 baseball）；（为达到某种目的而采取的）强硬手段；刀剑搏杀

sentences.sentence: I want us to play hardball on this issue.
sentences.translation: 我希望我们在这个问题上不手软。

sentences.sentence: She is playing hardball in a world dominated by men 20 years her senior.
sentences.translation: 她在一个由长她20岁的男人们主宰的世界里作风强硬。

sentences.sentence: But gone are the days when US policy hardball could force others to yield.
sentences.translation: 然而，美国用强硬政策使人屈服的日子已经一去不复返了。
